improvement_list.improvement_desc: Division by zero error. Add check to ensure 'n' is not zero before division.
The condition 'n / 0 == 5' will always throw a runtime error, thus the code within the 'if' block is unreachable.  The 'else' block is always executed.
Unreachable code. The 'if' condition always throws an error.
This line is always executed because the 'if' block is unreachable due to a division by zero.
